Global Flower Express

A wholesale flower store is your ultimate destination and best option to get excellent fresh flowers, fillings and flower arrangements in Los Angeles.

Make your purchases here in a fast easy and secure way.

We have the most used technological platforms on the market, that makes your experience on our website as pleasant as can be.

Haz de tu trabajo algo extraordinario

Contactame si estas preparado

Marketer

Our company goes to great lengths to ensure customers are satisfied with the service and products that we offer.
Such things include the purchase of your products from some of best farms in Ecuador, the handling of all the logistics that goes into bring your products over from out of the country, and transportation of goods to the door of your business, with all taxes and international expenses included.

Door to door delivery

From our distribution center, in Los Angeles, we offer door to door service, as well as the coordination process to any city within the states of Oregon - Washington - Nevada - Arizona and California. We guarantee that you will receive fresh flowers, ready for your purpose.

We are you located?

We are located on 741 San Pedro St Los Angeles, CA 90014.

Who is the shipping company?

We work with GLS (General Logistics Systems).

Where do your flowers come from?

Our flowers come from Ecuador & Colombia.
Flowers from Ecuador: Gypsophila, Lilies, Roses.
Flowers from Colombia: Greens (Brilliantine, Cocculus, Leather Leaf, Myrtle, Ruscus), hydrangeas, Pom pom, Spider.

Why do you set those prices?

Our prices reflect the quality of our flowers, aside from that our delivery is free.

On which days do you deliver?

We provide deliveries only on Wednesdays Thursdays & Fridays.

Do you do deliveries on Saturdays and Sundays?

No, the company that provides the logistics service does not deliver on Saturdays and Sundays.

What is the delivery price for the flower?

The delivery is totally free.

Do they deliver to all US states?

No, at the moment we provide service to the western states only (Arizona, California, Idaho, Nevada, New Mexico, Oregon, Utah y Washington).

Can I order a flower that does not appear on the website?

Yes, on our webpage we have the option for a customer inquiry. The message must contain all details that the customer is inquiring about. From there, we work on sending the order.

What is the time schedule for your deliveries?

Our logistics company provides delivery between 10:00 am – 5:00 pm.

Can I pick up directly from your establishment?

Yes, but the order must be paid for on the website.

Does your company have any other locations?

No, at the moment we do not have any other locations.

Visit Us!
